channel.title: Feed the summons?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Feed the summons?"

item.title: Re: Feed the summons?
item.content:encoded: actually suta u really should get EDUT as fast as possible since some of the items and ninja u really need normally have a 5-10% chance of coming with u which is quite frustrating( heck butterfly for example the mission alone is near impossible to find and when u do find it the butterfly always have way of escaping u)

item.title: Re: Feed the summons?
item.content:encoded: Currently the Wiki village is full (we've got 50 people and 3 people sitting as applications). Sometimes space does open up due to people not playing anymore, but I'd recommend having a backup option if you're looking for a Village.

item.title: Re: Feed the summons?
item.content:encoded: is the wiki village strong maby ill com over

item.title: Re: Feed the summons?
item.content:encoded: Apparently he just likes the wiki powers

item.title: Re: Feed the summons?
item.content:encoded: It's about time. You just needed to be in the Wiki village :)

item.title: Re: Feed the summons?
item.content:encoded:
YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES YES

I got lil' whitey! *chibi peacu*

item.title: Re: Feed the summons?
item.content:encoded:
lucky :P

And yea, I know I could get the EDUT but since I already have WhiteEye it seems like a massive waste of chakra. I have the dog, just not the xp to learn the ability. I may pick it up eventually.

item.title: Re: Feed the summons?
item.content:encoded: haha i start my character and the fist mission i get? Feed the Summons. i do it and sure thing lil' whitey comes around =) still would have liked better to get billy( really need the flipper/billy bonus team)

item.title: Re: Feed the summons?
item.content:encoded: I actually need to get my hands on a Ninja Dog, granted I've had 4 of the sodding things, just I never had access to buy EDUT & the +1 Nin never really appealed to me

item.title: Re: Feed the summons?
item.content:encoded:
Hahaha, if only that were possible ; )

As bad as this sounds, but you just have to go on trying.
I have done it different, though. When I became chunin I started on c-missions, because there's more money in there, and lost it all to the raffle until I got a ninja dog. Then I took my dog out for a few walks, doing general d-missions on the way, and got the allies and the reaper-items I needed using EDUT. It took a bit longer to level my char, but I was considerably stronger than most other nins in the same rank as me.

item.title: Re: Feed the summons?
item.content:encoded: I'll trade you all 5 of my CD's for lil' whitey :(

item.title: Re: Feed the summons?
item.content:encoded: I haven't gotten some of the Dank D & Rank C mission 'drops', heck I've not seen 1 Emo Rock CD since I started the game.

item.title: Re: Feed the summons?
item.content:encoded: I had 345 stamina today thanks to my 14 day bonus…all of my missions except 4 (I spent 40 stam sparring) were taijutsu focused. Not even ONE attempt at the summons mission *cries* My chunin is doomed to do D rank missions for all eternity.

item.title: Re: Feed the summons?
item.content:encoded: Thanks, i'll try it that way then. At least this way I can narrow it down farther by getting rid of all the other ones.

item.title: Re: Feed the summons?
item.content:encoded: You don't have to stick to general D-Rank missions. The mission will appear when doing Tai specific ones. I've seen it personally.

item.title: Re: Feed the summons?
item.content:encoded: Which is funny since I got 5 of the things in one day. Seems like the game just decides what to hold back with for each player :P "Oooo, your name starts with A…no lil' whitey for you. And yours is B so…no butterfly's. Ha it's perfect!"

item.title: Re: Feed the summons?
item.content:encoded:
You can keep doing D-Rank missions after you hit Chunin (you'll have a choice), so don't feel like you need to hold back on taking your exam. It sounds like you've just been unlucky though :(

I had similar streaks of bad luck when I was working on getting my Butterflies.

item.title: Re: Feed the summons?
item.content:encoded: I'm still Genin, I don't get a choice. I'll be Chunin by the end of the day though I think :3 But I guess it means I'm going to be farming away my D missions. Can try to get some emo pics and stuff while I do it I guess.

item.title: Re: Feed the summons?
item.content:encoded:
D-Rank missions only appear when doing D-Rank missions. Have you been selecting Taijutsu missions to try and get it? Or just general missions D-Rank missions?

Some missions won't show up when you select the attribute to focus in. We haven't found a good way to figure out which missions those are, but I've heard the Lil' Whitey one and the Bugman ones may be ones that only show up when requesting general missions.

item.title: Feed the summons?
item.content:encoded: To get lil' Whitey it says I have to do that D-Rank mission. I'm level 20+ now and haven't seen it even once o.o; Can I get the mission if I start doing C rank ones? Or do I have to keep repeating D to get it?
